Traits.Name: Wax Form
Traits.Content: The Candle Walker can move through the shadows, leaving behind a faint scent of burning wax. It does not provoke opportunity attacks when it leaves the reach of an enemy.

Traits.Name: Flickering Flame
Traits.Content: The Candle Walker's body burns with a flickering flame that lightly illuminates a 10-foot radius. Creatures within this radius must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Candle Walker is a spellcaster that uses Charisma as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells: At will: dancing lights, minor illusion. 1/day each: burning hands, disguise self.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Candle Walker makes three attacks with its main attack.

Actions.Name: Flame Whip
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 11 (2d8 + 2) fire damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be ignited, taking 2 (1d4) fire damage at the start of each of its turns until a creature uses an action to extinguish the flames.

Actions.Name: Wax Projectiles
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, dealing 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Melting Aura
Actions.Content: The Candle Walker emits a wave of hot wax in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn as the wax hardens around them. This ability recharges on a roll of 5 or 6 on a d6.
